flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36>>36 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36=$<<120+36=152>>152
So he makes 152*25=$<<152*25=3800>>3800 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 3800*4=$<<3800*4=15200>>15200
#### 15200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 156, not 152. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
